description:
Replaces values in a text with some or all matches of a pattern replaced by a new value.
The pattern can be a text or a regular expression.
If pattern is a text, only the first occurrence will be replaced.

input.name: pattern
input.description:
The text or regular expression to be replaced.
Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: replacement
input.description:
The text that replaces the 'pattern'.
If unspecified, matches will be replaced with a blank text (i.e. `""`).

output.name: text
output.description: A text with the values replaced.
